name: Police Enforcement VR : 1-King-27
description: Police Simulator Built From The Ground Up For Virtual Reality!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NIVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
